wordGroup: radio astronomer n. 射电天文学

sentences.en: My ideal is to be an astronomer.
sentences.cn: 我的理想是当一个天文学家。

sentences.en: One day, an astronomer came to the village.
sentences.cn: 一天，村子里来了一个天文学家。

sentences.en: She was an astronomer to help work on the project.
sentences.cn: 她是来协助帮助完成这个项目的天文学家。
